company_description: H2 Green Steel operates a steel production plant to accelerate the decarbonization of the steel industry using green hydrogen. It provides a digitalized and automated greenfield steel plant by bringing together raw materials, renewable energy, and artificial intelligence to help clients have access to fossil-free steel at a leading cost position. The project includes a giga-scale green hydrogen plant as an integrated part of the steel production facility. H2 Green Steel was established in 2020 in Stockholm, Sweden.
